weather: Chance Light Rain and Patchy Fog
Chance Light Rain and Patchy Fog
text: A chance of rain before midnight, then a chance of drizzle or light rain after midnight.  Patchy fog after midnight.  Otherwise, cloudy, with a low around 47. Northeast wind 6 to 13 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 50%.

A chance of drizzle or light rain before 9am, then a chance of rain, mainly between 9am and 3pm.  Patchy fog before 9am.  Otherwise, mostly cloudy, with a high near 59. Northeast wind 6 to 8 mph becoming south in the afternoon.  Chance of precipitation is 40%.

A chance of drizzle or light rain, mainly between 9pm and 3am, then a chance of rain after 3am.  Patchy fog.  Otherwise, mostly cloudy, with a low around 51. West wind 6 to 10 mph becoming northeast after midnight.  Chance of precipitation is 50%.
Rain likely, mainly before 3pm.  Cloudy, with a high near 60. Northeast wind around 9 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 60%. New precipitation amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
A chance of rain, mainly before 9pm.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. Northeast wind 5 to 10 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 30%.
